question: A uniform electric field <katex>$E=3\times10^{5}NC^{-1}$</katex> is acting along the positive Y-axis. The electric flux through a rectangle of area <katex>$10~cm\times30~cm$</katex> whose plane is parallel to the Z-X plane is
explanation: Area vector <katex>$\vec{A}$</katex> is parallel to Y-axis (normal to Z-X plane).
